description:
An AGCM experiment with monthly-varying SSTs and sea-ice taken from each model's own piControl simulation (using the 30 years of piControl that are parallel to years 111-140 of its abrupt4xCO2 run) with quadrupled CO2 concentration seen by the radiation code and the vegetation code. Other atmospheric constituents and any other necessary boundary conditions (e.g. vegetation if required) taken from each model's own piControl simulation (using the 30 years of piControl that are parallel to years 111-140 of its abrupt4xCO2 run). Dynamic vegetation should be turned off.
Same as piSST-control but CO2 is quadrupled. The increase in CO2 is seen by both the radiation scheme and vegetation.
keywords: CFMIP, Tier 2, Pre-industrial SST and SIC, PI forcing, 4xCO2 radiation, 4xCO2 vegetation
rationale: To understand regional climate responses to CO2 forcing.
